articles.title: Hurricanes board member Troy Bowker denies being racist after TJ Perenara speaks out against him - Newshub
articles.description: "We as a country should be proud of our ancestors whether they are European or Māori."
articles.content:
Hurricanes board member Troy Bowker stands by comments labelled as racist, saying his views have "nothing to do with rugby" after he was criticised by star player TJ Perenara.
